content:
I continue to be deadnamed in campaign text messages â€¦ and I send out text messages! I suspect some but not all of them come from the texting team here, but the truth is I canâ€™t be certain. 

What I do know is Iâ€™ve asked multiple times for my record to be changed to reflect my preferred name. And it still hasnâ€™t happened.

Does anyone here have a way to update that info once and for all? ğŸ™ğŸ»ğŸ’œ

Your state Democrat organization will typically have a database of Democrats that it pulls that info from. I would try reaching out to your county chair to start. https://www.njdems.org/your-party-county-parties/ 

I hope this helps!

Thank you, Paul. That certainly helps on the state end, and I do know many here at the county level and some at the state level. 

What I worry about is that it wonâ€™t reach the national level in a timely manner and I will continue to be deadnamed anyway for the duration of our campaign.

Also, if they give me the â€œitâ€™s not your legal nameâ€ excuse then I will have some especially strong words as well. It is not necessarily safe for folks to legally change their name at various points in time. A social name change must be plenty. Behind the scenes there are cases where a legal name must be used but out in the open itâ€™s a very different matter. 

Addressing someone by their chosen/preferred name is nothing less than a life saving act, and that doesnâ€™t just apply to the LGBTQ+ community.

So I ask again, even as Iâ€™m reaching out to my state org, is there anyone HERE who has connections to help expedite that change?

Ok I know our NJ (Somerset) county chair so Iâ€™ve messaged her. Iâ€™ve also messaged my spouse who is a NJ Dems state committee member from our county as well, and our amazing county clerk who may also have ideas.

The text messages have just increased so much itâ€™s like death by a thousand cuts to keep seeing the wrong name in a campaign youâ€™re simultaneously trying your level best to enthusiastically support. It legit hurts.

Meanwhile, still open to other thoughts and info.
